ObjectClass.Name: Guardian Keeper
ObjectClass.Description:
GUARDIAN KEEPER: Non-achronal support Keeper for resource conversion and defense
Can spawn Spider Probe suicide scouts Can assimilate QP and Power Can revert LC to QP
+2 HP/s regen while full E

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 40 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\2X Atk rate if Energy is full \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\All: 60 (+60), R 35, SR 2, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Assimilate QPlasma
Objective.Details: \Rapidly extract QP and P from nearby \ QP Transport Boxes \ \ + 30 QP,P / Q-P Core / 10 Charge

Objective.Name: Revert LCrystal -> QPlasma
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires B-Tech\ upgrade at the MOUND

Objective.Name: Revert LCrystal -> QPlasma
Objective.Details: \Convert 400 L-Crystal to Q-Plasma\converts 5 QP/s over 80 s \ \400 LC + 480 P + 80 E = 400 QP

Objective.Name: Spawn Spider Probe
Objective.Details: \Spawn a temporary scout probe\Agile but easy destroyed \40s lifespan\S-Tech: enables suicide attack
